com.hazelcast.monitor

Interface LocalTopicStats

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JsonSerializable, LocalInstanceStats
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalTopicStatsImpl

    public interface LocalTopicStats
extends LocalInstanceStats
    Local topic statistics to be used by MemberState implementations.
